UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Indolicidin analogs with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity and low hemolytic activity
Literature.Author: Smirnova MP, Kolodkin NI, Kolobov AA, Afonin VG, Afonina IV, Stefanenko LI, Shpen VM, Shamova OV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC50=33.3±12.91µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC50=16.7±6.45µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC50=11.3±3.06µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC50=208.3±20.41µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis L2(MIC50=125±27.39µg/ml)
